headline: Will Ralph Lauren (RL) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Ralph Lauren (RL) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

raw.headline: Will Ralph Lauren (RL) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?

headline: Retailers Stockpiled to Avoid Tariffs. The Holidays Will Put That to the Test.
summary: Retailers are sitting on a pile of goods.  From  Ralph Lauren  to  Levi Strauss  and  American Eagle Outfitters  retailers have bulked up their inventory, an intentional move to get goods before import tariffs went into effect.  The risk heading into the crucial holiday shopping season is that inflation-wary shoppers won’t spend as much or will buy fewer items because prices are higher.
